declarations.description:
The 'furo-ui5-checkbox-input' component allows the user to switch true and false for Bool with data binding.

It supports all features from the [SAP ui5 checkbox element](https://sap.github.io/ui5-webcomponents/playground/components/CheckBox/).

You can bind  `bool` type, `furo.fat.Bool` type or the `google.wrapper.BoolValue`  type.

```html
 <furo-ui5-checkbox-input
    Æ’-bind-data="--daoCountry(*.data.classified_as_risk_area)"
 ></furo-ui5-checkbox-input>
```

### Specificity
1. Attributes which are set in the html source will have the highest specificity and will never get overwritten by metas or fat.
2. Attributes set in meta will have the lowest specificity and will be overwritten by attributes from fat.

| meta 	| fat 	| html 	|
|------	|-----	|------	|
| 1    	| 10  	| 100  	|


## supported FAT attributes
 - **"readonly":"true"** set the element to readonly
 - **"disabled":"true"** set the element to disabled

## supported meta and constraints
- **readonly: true** , set the element to readonly

The constraint **required** will mark the element as required.
declarations.name: FuroUi5CheckboxInput

members.name: readAttributes
members.description: Reads the attributes which are set on the component dom.

members.name: _updateFNA
members.description: Handler function for the checkbox changes.

members.name: _updateLabelsFromFat
members.description: labels are map <string,bool>, we handle every boolean attribute with the labels

members.name: _updateAttributesFromFat
members.description: sync input attributes according to fat attributes

members.name: _setValueState
members.description:
Updates the valueState
ui5 checkbox has only 3 states: Warning, Error, and None (default) https://sap.github.io/ui5-webcomponents/playground/components/CheckBox/

members.name: onFnaLabelChanged
members.description:
overwrite onFnaLabelChanged function
label is mapped to text

members.name: _previousValueState
members.description: used to restore the state after a invalidation -> validation change

members.name: _attributesFromFNA
_privilegedAttributes
members.description:
a list of privileged attributes. when those attributes are set in number-input components initially.
they can not be modified later via response or spec
null is used because getAttribute returns null or value
members.default:
{
      readonly: null,
      disabled: null,
      text: null,
      indeterminate: null,
      checked: null,
    }

events.description: Fired when the checkbox checked state changes.
events.name: change

events.description: Fires the field value when it changes.
events.name: value-changed
